panels.description: The % of available charge or discharge power, assuming a 1C charge/discharge rate is possible (e.g 100A for a 100Ah battery)

targets.query: SELECT abs(mean(OperatingCapacity)) FROM (SELECT last("PackCurrent_Reading")/last("FullCapacity")*100 AS "OperatingCapacity" FROM "mqtt_consumer" GROUP BY "topic")

panels.title: Combined Operating Capacity

panels.description: State of charge for all batteries

targets.query: SELECT mean(SOC) FROM (SELECT  last("SOC") AS SOC FROM "mqtt_consumer" GROUP BY "topic")

panels.title: Combined SOC

targets.query: SELECT  mean(Voltage) FROM (SELECT  last("PackVoltage_Reading") AS Voltage FROM "mqtt_consumer" GROUP BY "topic")

panels.description: Charge or discharge state for all batteries

targets.query: SELECT mean(Power) FROM (SELECT  last("Power") AS Power FROM "mqtt_consumer" GROUP BY "topic")

panels.title: State

panels.description: Charge or discharge power for all batteries

targets.query: SELECT  sum(Power) FROM (SELECT  last("Power") AS Power FROM "mqtt_consumer" GROUP BY "topic")

panels.title: Combined Power

targets.query: SELECT  sum(Current) FROM (SELECT  last("PackCurrent_Reading") AS Current FROM "mqtt_consumer" GROUP BY "topic")

panels.description:
State of charge difference between that reported (which uses estimated capacity) and an approximate % based off a 46V to 55V voltage range.

With multiple battery packs, the deviation sometimes becomes large and the capacity needs resetting.

The 6 in the calculation is derived from (55/(55-46)).

targets.query: SELECT last("SOC") FROM "mqtt_consumer" GROUP BY "topic"
SELECT  (last("PackVoltage_Reading")-(6*(55-last("PackVoltage_Reading")))) / 55 *100 AS Voltage FROM "mqtt_consumer" GROUP BY "topic"

panels.title: SOC Deviation (46V>55V vs 0>100%)

panels.description: Cycle count for each battery, assuming grade A cells rated for up to 6000 cycles.

targets.query: SELECT last("CycleCount") FROM "mqtt_consumer" GROUP BY "topic"

panels.title: Pack Cycle Count

panels.description: Stage of charge as reported by the BMS (which uses estimate Ah capacity by measuring total input and output

targets.query: SELECT last("SOC") FROM "mqtt_consumer" GROUP BY "topic"

panels.title: Pack SOC (BMS)

panels.description: Power to/from each battery over time

targets.query: SELECT mean("Power") AS Power FROM "mqtt_consumer" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Granularity), "topic" fill(null)

panels.title: Pack Power

panels.description: Stage of charge estimated from voltage

targets.query: SELECT  (last("PackVoltage_Reading")-(6*(55-last("PackVoltage_Reading")))) / 55 *100 AS Voltage FROM "mqtt_consumer" GROUP BY "topic"

panels.title: Pack SOC (46>55V)

panels.description: Voltage and Current to/from each pack over time

targets.query: SELECT mean("PackVoltage_Reading") FROM "mqtt_consumer" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Granularity), "topic" fill(null)
SELECT mean("PackCurrent_Reading") FROM "mqtt_consumer" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Granularity), "topic" fill(null)

panels.title: Pack Voltage & Current

panels.description: Measured capacity of each pack based on charge/discharge  over time

targets.query: SELECT mean("RemainingCapacity") AS MosfetTemp FROM "mqtt_consumer" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Granularity), "topic" fill(null)
SELECT mean("FullCapacity") AS MosfetTemp FROM "mqtt_consumer" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Granularity), "topic" fill(null)

panels.title: Pack Capacity

targets.query: SELECT mean("Temps_MOS_T_Reading") AS MosfetTemp FROM "mqtt_consumer" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Granularity), "topic" fill(null)
SELECT mean("Temps_ENV_T_Reading") AS MosfetTemp FROM "mqtt_consumer" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Granularity), "topic" fill(null)

SELECT mean("Cells_Cell_1_Reading") AS Cell1, mean("Cells_Cell_2_Reading") AS Cell2, mean("Cells_Cell_3_Reading") AS Cell3, mean("Cells_Cell_4_Reading") AS Cell4, mean("Cells_Cell_5_Reading") AS Cell5, mean("Cells_Cell_6_Reading") AS Cell6, mean("Cells_Cell_7_Reading") AS Cell7, mean("Cells_Cell_8_Reading") AS Cell8, mean("Cells_Cell_9_Reading") AS Cell9, mean("Cells_Cell_10_Reading") AS Cell10, mean("Cells_Cell_11_Reading") AS Cell11, mean("Cells_Cell_12_Reading") AS Cell12, mean("Cells_Cell_13_Reading") AS Cell13, mean("Cells_Cell_14_Reading") AS Cell14, mean("Cells_Cell_15_Reading") AS Cell15, mean("Cells_Cell_16_Reading") AS Cell16 FROM "mqtt_consumer" WHERE ("topic" =~ /$battery$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Granularity) fill(null)

SELECT mean("Temps_CellTemp1_4_Reading") AS "Cell1-4", mean("Temps_CellTemp5_8_Reading") AS "Cell5-8", mean("Temps_CellTemp9_12_Reading") AS "Cell9-12", mean("Temps_CellTemp13_16_Reading") AS "Cell13-16" FROM "mqtt_consumer" WHERE ("topic" =~ /$battery$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Granularity) fill(null)
